description:
* Based on a light novel series by http://anidb.net/cr30211 [Torako], with illustrations by http://anidb.net/cr32380 [Ousaka Nozomi].
http://anidb.net/ch39997 [Togashi Yuuta] suffered from http://anidb.net/t2496 [chuunibyou] while he was in middle school. When he graduated, he put that dark history behind him and forgot about it... or he was supposed to. High school was smooth sailing and full of enjoyment — until the unavoidable, sad event occurred. The event that locked Yuuta into a contract with http://anidb.net/ch39996 [Takanashi Rikka] and disrupted his desperately ordinary life.
Source: Adapted from the back of the first novel.

REGULAR.description:
After recovering from adolescent delusions, Yuta transfers schools to begin anew. As he tastes the succulent fruit of normalcy, Rikka Takanashi discovers Yuta`s delusional past and declares that they are soul mates, which makes things anything but normal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Chance Encounter... with Wicked Lord Shingan
Rencontre avec le Jaô Shingan, l`Œil de Vérité du roi du Mal

REGULAR.description:
Yuta wants to crush on the beautiful Shinka, but Rikka`s antics prohibit it. A visit to Rikka`s house reveals how delusional she really is. Her eclectic collections are almost stranger than her behavior! What’s worse:  Rikka`s sister knows about Yuta`s past!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 旋律の...聖調理人[プリーステス]

REGULAR.description:
Yuta tries to decide what club to join, but Rikka is already a step ahead of him. She creates the "Far-Eastern Magic Society" and manages to rope in two members. Given a provisional club status, Yuta revokes his membership...until Shinka joins the club, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 異端なる... 双尾娘[ツインテール]

REGULAR.description:
Yuta is puzzled that Nibutani wants to join Rikka`s club. He wonders if she could really like him back, but the answer he gets isn`t the one he imagined!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 痛恨の... 闇聖典[マビノギオン]

REGULAR.description:
Rikka and Yuta face their low grades, and their club is fingered as the culprit! Rikka begins a new battle with her latest opponent: math! Meanwhile, Dekomori and Nibutani continue to butt heads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 束縛の...十字架[ハード・スタディ]

REGULAR.description:
Rikka makes club uniforms for everyone, further humiliating Yuta; tension between Nibutani and Dekomori continues to grow. Isshiki receives a love letter, but his plans hit a snag before they even begin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 贖罪の...救世主[イノセント]

REGULAR.description:
A trip to Rika`s hometown reveals more about her than Yuta had anticipated.  Dekomori continues her antics against her nemesis "Mori-Summer".  Yuta and Rika escape the house in search of the Invisible Boundary Line, and end up in a place Rika holds dear to her heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 追憶の...楽園喪失[パラダイス・ロスト]

REGULAR.description:
After refusing to face the truth about her father, Rikka "retreats" to her home with Yuta in tow.  Makoto is finding it tough to figure out his feelings for Kumin, and Yuta  shares a night together with Rikka that impacts them both in a very meaningful way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Exiled... Just the Two of Them
Une fuite... Seuls tous les deux
二人だけの...逃避行[エグザイル]

REGULAR.description:
The school festival is on, and amidst Shinka`s attempts to turn their club into something legitimate, Rikka battles strange feelings that she only experiences when Yuta is around.  Shinka decides to help her understand these feelings, but Rikka`s full blown case of chunibyo keeps getting in the way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un premier amour compliqué... et chaotique
混沌の...初恋煩[カオス・ハート]

REGULAR.description:
Rikka and Yuta are unsure of where they`re headed, and each gets some advice from a friend.  Rikka`s sister reveals her intention of studying the culinary arts in Italy, and asks Yuta to help her with Rikka.  Through their own special ways, Yuta and Rikka confess to each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La boîte-repas de Pandore de la Sainte Mère
聖母の...弁当箱[パンドラズ・ボックス]

REGULAR.description:
Rikka begins to acclimate herself to living a normal life, successfully making friends in the process.  Sanae, however, isn`t too happy about it.  Rikka heads off to visit her father`s grave, with Yuta left at the station, waiting for her to return.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 片翼の堕天使[フォーリン・エンジェル]

REGULAR.description:
Yuta begins to worry after it becomes apparent that Rikka may not come back.  Sanae ditches her Dekomori persona to follow suit with Rikka, while Kumin "inherits" Wicked Lord Shingan`s powers.  Yuta can`t bear being without Rikka and sets off to find her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 終天の契約[エターナル・エンゲージ]

SPECIAL.description:
Some time after Rikka returns to the school, the gang has a Christmas party at Sanae`s mansion.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 煌めきの... 聖爆誕祭[スラップスティック・ノエル]
Lite 邪王真眼・黎明篇

Lite 凸守 VS 丹生谷
